modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will be applied to its corresponding attribute.
modifier.markdownDescription: If specified, this modifier will be applied to its corresponding attribute.

modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to their corresponding attributes.
modifiers.markdownDescription: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to their corresponding attributes.

tick_rate.description: The frequency (in ticks) with which to check the condition. Lower values mean the condition changes are detected more quickly, but this comes at a potentially huge performance cost.
tick_rate.markdownDescription: The frequency (in ticks) with which to check the condition. Lower values mean the condition changes are detected more quickly, but this comes at a potentially huge performance cost.

update_health.description: Determines whether the health percentage will update to match the entity's new maximum health.
update_health.markdownDescription: Determines whether the health percentage will update to match the entity's new maximum health.

type.description:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/conditioned_attribute)

Applies one or more attribute modifiers; may depend on a `condition`.

Type ID: `origins:conditioned_attribute`

!!! note

    You can use the [Attribute (Power Type)](attribute.md) if an entity condition is not needed.

!!! note

    Refer to the [Minecraft Wiki: Attribute](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Attribute) page for a list of **vanilla** attributes that you can modify.
type.markdownDescription:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/conditioned_attribute)

Applies one or more attribute modifiers; may depend on a `condition`.

Type ID: `origins:conditioned_attribute`

!!! note

    You can use the [Attribute (Power Type)](attribute.md) if an entity condition is not needed.

!!! note

    Refer to the [Minecraft Wiki: Attribute](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Attribute) page for a list of **vanilla** attributes that you can modify.
